info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fulton, southeastern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Falls, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Oppenheim, Nelliston, Ingham Mills, Crum Creek, Garlock Corners, Charlesworth Corners, Kringsbush, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Doxtater Corner, Fink Basin, Mindenville, Kelhi Corners, Davys Corners, Fical Corners and Scotchbrush. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
